title: Book Online at Aspen Falls Spinal Care Center South Jordan
cleaned_text: Book an Appointment Welcome to our online booking site Chiropractic Helps minimize migraines and neck-related headaches. Improves your posture. Reduces pain and improves range of motion of your spine and other joints. Reduces symptoms of chronic conditions like osteoarthritis. Treats minor neck or spine injuries, especially whiplash. Acupuncture [Read More](7-description) Acupuncture has been shown to help with pain, sore muscles, anxiety, insomnia, stress, hormone balancing, boost the immune system, digestive help, and fertility. Acupuncture is an ancient technique that involves the placement of very fine, single use sterile needles into precise points along the body and in certain muscle groups. The body registers each needle as a "micro-injury" and stimulates the brain to release natural pain killers (endorphins) and increase circulation to those areas to help with healing. [Back to Booking Page](/locations/aspen-falls-spinal-care-center-south-jordan/book) Select a treatment from the list on the left to view available appointment times Located at: 912 W Baxter Dr , Ste 130, South
